#include <iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
unsigned long long area(unsigned long long len, unsigned long long bre);
unsigned long long isprime(unsigned long long x);
int main()
{
 int t;
 cin>>t;
 while(t--)
 {
 	unsigned long long l,b;
 	scanf("%lld%lld",&l,&b);
 unsigned long long reduced=area(l,b);
     printf("%lld\n",reduced);
 }
	
	return 0;
}
unsigned long long area( unsigned long long len,unsigned long long bre)
{
	len=isprime(len);
	bre=isprime(bre);
	return len*bre;
}
unsigned long long isprime(unsigned long long x)
{

	bool flag=false;
	for(long int i=2;i<=sqrt(x);i++)
	{
		if(x%i==0)
		{
			flag=true;
			break;
		}	
	}
		if(x==3 || x==1)
	{
		return 1;		
	}
	
	if(flag==true)
	return x;
	else
	return x-1;

}
